QuestData.Title: Tracking the Shadows
QuestData.Description:
The quarry has been slain, and my duties fulfilled. The tirnenn are more than capable of defending their home from the lesser devourers. Nature will take its course.
I will report back to Lord Herne and meet you at the Heart of the Forest. There we shall see what I will be hunting next.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Ysera in the Heart of the Forest.
QuestData.RewardText:
Even in the afterlife, the legend of Huln Highmountain continues to grow.
You have done well to secure his aid, $n. Now let our search begin.
